The gameplay & mechanics of Overwatch has always been fantastic.  People aren't wrong to be salty about the broken promise from the developer regarding PvE.  PvE was promised, and later dropped.  

Another point of contention is that the developer changed the monetization model from OW1 to OW2.  In the original, you paid for the game, and then everything else was free.  In OW2, the game is free, but they are charging money for the skins and the premium battlepass.  No big deal, IMO.  The game itself is free, and is a lot of fun. 

Ignore the negative reviews and just play the game.

How can you play a game when they take away everything you loved about playing it? 6v6 to 5v5 now? The whole reason for this was to make the Pve. Then that was canceled? Now its this co op (which is 15 dollars). Its sad nice money grabbing I guess. This games main focus is to sell you skins and battle passes, nothing about game play or anything.

Oh you want a REAL review? Okay...

♥ Everything is a baffling laser light show. I could end the review right here. The first game was this and nothing has changed.
♦ The game still boils down to "flick your willy until everyone has ult charged, then spam on the point all at once." Casual and competitive players will find it shallow.
♣ Nothing is well-balanced. They had to outright remove a character (Bastion) for 1 year because they couldn't balance him... when he was playable on release and throughout OW1. Roadhog was murdered in cold blood by balance patches.
♠ It's a stripped down Overwatch 1 designed to yank as much money out of paypiggy nipples as possible. "If they're dumb enough to buy the hype once, they'll do it again!" is the motto. They ripped a page out of the World of Warcraft expansion playbook.
♥ Battlepass garbage (see above). It would take thousands of dollars to afford everything in this game. That includes playable heroes. Imagine a game's meta being defined by a character you have to shell out tons of cash to even access.
♦ The only feedback Blizzard has ever taken to heart regarding this game is the campaign lamenting a lack of black female characters... and even that was probably something they astroturfed in-house (like the Blender porn they were caught commissioning.) 
♣ Jeff Kaplan AKA Tigole is a massive jew hack fraud. He's gone now but nothing he ruined was ever fixed (such as Roadhog.)
♠ The PVE game mode that was allegedly the entire reason Overwatch 1 had to be re-developed was cancelled, then resurrected, then revealed to be a hastily-made hackjob to try and salvage PR. 

I played this game for 300+ hours. I hit the highest competitive rank, then refused to play anymore when Blizzard demanded my phone number... which they still do.
This game is a mess. Blizzard is a mess. If you have any hope for this game even with the Microsoft acquisition then you have rocks in your head, just look at what they did to Halo.
Go play Warcraft 3, Starcraft 1 (and I guess 2) and Diablo 2. Pretend Blizzard died after.

A shadow of its former self that disrespects your time and your money. Preordered the original back in the day, played it a ton and even though loot boxes weren't an ideal system, at least it was free cosmetics you could get for just playing. Now they just want your money for every single little thing, 20 bucks for legendaries, battle passes that take too long to complete and filled with garbage, and most importantly, this isn't anything but a sequel to the monetization system, not the game itself.

Stay away from this pile of trash and just look at the porn if anything, at least that's higher quality and a real free to play.

Держим планку говна, Близзард, собственно, как всегда.

Давайте не будем опускаться до "контора пидорасов(оптимистов)" и тп, я все понимаю.
Я играла в овер с 2017 года и всегда любила эту игру, несмотря на лютую монетизацию, что тогда, сейчас стало ещё хуже.
Единственный плюс появления в стиме - возможность покупки для ру игроков, но...
ОГРОМНОЕ НО, отсутствие общих серверов стима и близзард. Ожидание каток на хила - 11 минут, постоянное падение серверов и ну такое.....
А еще -  твой старый прогресс игры (1500 часов блин) не учитывается в новой системе прогресса, говнище.
15 баксов это грабёж средь бела дня.
А еще победные позы только за золото? Вы че совсем обалдели?

Добро пожаловать в стим, близзард, поешьте говна за все эти годы.
